description: ANTS Motion Correction application to perform motion correction on 4D time series data.

dimensionality.title: Dimensionality
dimensionality.description: This option forces the image to be treated as a specified-dimensional image. If not specified, the program tries to infer the dimensionality from the input image.

n_images.title: Number of images
n_images.description: This option sets the number of images to use to construct the template image.

metric.title: Metric
metric.description: Metrics for registration: GC (global correlation), CC (ANTS neighborhood cross correlation), MI (Mutual information), and Demons.

use_fixed_reference_image.title: Use fixed reference image
use_fixed_reference_image.description: Use a fixed reference image to correct all volumes, instead of correcting each image to the prior volume in the time series.

use_scales_estimator.title: Use scales estimator
use_scales_estimator.description: Use the scale estimator to control optimization.

transform.title: Transform
transform.description: Several transform options are available: Affine, Rigid, GaussianDisplacementField, SyN.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: Specify the number of iterations at each level.

smoothing_sigmas.title: Smoothing sigmas
smoothing_sigmas.description: Specify the sigma for smoothing at each level. Smoothing may be specified in mm units or voxels with 'AxBxCmm' or 'AxBxCvox'. No units implies voxels.

shrink_factors.title: Shrink factors
shrink_factors.description: Specify the shrink factor for the virtual domain (typically the fixed image) at each level.

output.title: Output transform prefix
output.description: Specify the output transform prefix (output format is .nii.gz ). Optionally, one can choose to warp the moving image to the fixed space and, if the inverse transform exists, one can also output the warped fixed image.

average_image.title: Average image
average_image.description: Average the input time series image.

write_displacement.title: Write displacement
write_displacement.description: Write the low-dimensional 3D transforms to a 4D displacement field.

use_histogram_matching.title: Use histogram matching
use_histogram_matching.description: Histogram match the moving images to the reference image.

random_seed.title: Random seed
random_seed.description: Use a fixed seed for random number generation.

interpolation.title: Interpolation
interpolation.description: Several interpolation options are available in ITK. The above are available (default Linear).
